AESKey

AESKey

An ActionScript 3 implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard, as defined in FIPS PUB 197 Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

Derived from

A public domain implementation from Karl Malbrain, malb.nosp@m.rain@yaho.nosp@m.o.com (http://www.geocities.com/malbrain/aestable_c.html)

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.
